title: New: Stumbleine – Drifting Youth
body:
So comes the end of another day, a day filled almost entirely with eating too much fried chicken and filming out of work actresses.

Now I don’t want to speak for us all, but I will regardless; we all need to chill the fuck out. The new mini album from **[Stumbleine](http://www.facebook.com/stumbleineuk)** entitled, **_Drifting Youth_**, is likely to do the trick. A blissed out, spatially aware and dense series of tracks that feel as fragile as they do empowered. What’s perhaps most impressive about the record is its ability never to break the spell; each track blends seamlessly into the last, the soul elements blending deliciously with the ambience, clashing at perfectly composed moments to deliver a heart breaking kick to the heart as well as the convention.

Stream the whole thing below.
